author: gnodet
msg: Fix jms configuration: avoid NPE, load from classpath if available, prefix properties by component name

author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-2306 [drlvm][jvmti] VM crashes if j.l.Thread is instrumented by JVMTI profiler
Tests passed on Ubuntu6 x86, Windows 2003 server and SuSE9 x86_64

author: ritchiem
msg: Updated EncodingUtils.java to include a single Character field so we can tell the difference between a char and a string of length 1.

author: ritchiem
msg: replyTo destination was invalid when using TemporaryQueues as the getEncodingName was using a simple method for encoding the Destination. This has been updated to use a BindingURL as this is more transportable. getEncodingName removed from all AMQDestination subclasses and now is implemented in AMQDestination as a call to toURL()
Created static Destination.createDestination(BindingURL) to create the correct destination from a BindingURL. PropertiesFileInitialContextFactory.java and AbstractJMSMessage.java updated to use this.

author: ritchiem
msg: Minor white space and logging changes
